body.name: Hepa Air Purifier for Home 200 Sq.ft Large Room with Air Quality Sensor, Filters The Air, Removes Allergies/Molds/Dust/Smoke/Odor/Pollen/Pets Dander and Other Particles
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 17 hrs 46 mins
features: High-Performance & Compact: The TredyHome HEPA Air Purifier refreshes the air in large rooms up to 800 sq. ft at a rate of 1 time per hour, In a 200 sq. ft. room, it can clean the air up to 4 times per hour, removing harmful particles such as allergens, molds, dust, smoke, and pollen through its patented 360-degree filtration system.

Smart & Automatic: With AUTO MODE, the smart air purifier can adjusts fan speed automatically according to the air quality, 2-4-8H TIMER, SLEEP MODE,Filter Change Reminder and NIGHT-LIGHT MODE, this air purifier is designed for convenience and customizable options for your lifestyle.

Built-in Air Quality Sensor: The TD-1500 HEPA Air Purifier is equipped with a built-in air quality sensor that detects surrounding air quality quickly, and the AQ Light indicates 4 levels of air quality(Red - Polluted | Orange - Normal | Green - Good | Blue - Pure), allowing you to monitor the purifier's performance easily.

4-Stage H13 True HEPA Filter: Its 4-stage filter includes a pre-filter that captures hairs, furs, and pets' dander, a true HEPA filter that removes smoke, dust, and pollen, an activated-carbon filter that eliminates odor, smell, and VOCs, and a protective net filter that stops any particles from going into the air fan system and protects the machine.

Included Contents: Each package includes one TredyHome HEPA Air Purifier with an inserted HEPA filter and a customer manual book. Replacement filters are available in the TredyHome store (search ASIN: B08152MLP4). The filter usually lasts for more than 6 months if you use it normally and clean it every 1-2 weeks with a vacuum cleaner..
High-Technology: With its advanced technology, the TredyHome HEPA Air Purifier removes 99.97% of airborne pollutant particles as tiny as 0.3 microns, providing fresh, clean indoor air.
TTrustworthy and Safe: The TD-1500 Home Air Purifier is FCC certified, ETL listed, and CARB Listed, ensuring its safety and quality.

Ideal for Bedroom: The Air Purifier for bedroom is designed to be super quiet with a noise level of only 28dB, making it perfect for use while sleeping. Its night-light mode can completely off, creates a calming effect, helping you sleep better at night.

Improve Indoor Air Quality: Invest in your health and breathe easy with the TredyHome HEPA Air Purifier. Perfect for those with allergies or wanting to improve their indoor air quality, this innovative device provides fresh, clean air in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and effective
reviews.reviewText: I've had this unit since 2020. We have a forced hot air heating system in our home and I tend to get stuffy in the winter with the windows closed. This unit helps quite a bit to eleviate that problem. I have it in a 12 x 12 room and it seems to do a good job in that space. It's especially effective near the computer where I spend a good amount of time. It does a good job of clearing up cooking odors and it's very quiet, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and works*updated
reviews.reviewText: Update: i never update reviews but today I am. It is working great! I opened it up just to see if its doing its job and honestly I was surprised by all the dust tht it had collected. Sorry I didnt take photos. So I decided to take it home instead of my office and put a different one there. Using in my bedroom to see if it helps with the dry throat and burning eyes I wake up with. I have 3 small dogs and an ongoing mold/fungus growth issue in our bathroom in our main room.Just wanted to say I also tested the unit to see if the light would change colors indicating dirty air or not. I vape (yeah i know i need to stop) and Ive always known tht the vapors it creates is not just vapor mist, its a carcinogen, better than cigs but anyways……I blew my hit straight into the unit and it responded immediately. Took it a few seconds before going back to blue. So yes it works, and yes it cuts down on dustmites, skin cells, and dog hair. Also cleans the air from stinky baby diapers tht have had a blow out, so smells too.I love this unit. Its pleasing to look at and it works. Wish it was available in different colors like maybe black, navy or my fav color Terra Cotta. Either way anyone tht sees it asks me info about it so Im sure Ive referred a few buyers this way. If I had the $ i would get one for every room in my house! Honestly I think it wrks better than my Levoit I have thts the same size.Not sure yet how clean its getting the air in my space but it does wonders for smells and gives off a nice white noise. Im using it in my office. Im a massage therapist so anything to reduce noise from next door and help with skin cells going everywhere is welcomed! Plus its nice looking which is a bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This air purifier looks and works great!
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I noticed after unboxing this purifier is the look and feel of the device -- it feels VERY sturdy, and aesthetically looks like something Apple or Dyson would produce. I opened the device up to remove the plastic from the filter, and the inside appearance matched the quality of the outer shell. Overall, I was well impressed with the appearance.After plugging the device in, it appears that the same amount of detail was given to the electronic controls of the purifier. The touch controls have a nice "beep," and the noise level from the fan is just enough to hear, but not too loud to be intrusive. I've read reviews of people using this as a noise machine, and I believe it would work well for that. I've used it for three days now, and haven't noticed any difference other than a "clean" smell throughout the house. We weren't having any odor issues before, but the house definitely feels and smells fresh and clean. I'll update this review later with more specifics.Lastly, the quality of the filter unit is top-notch. I'm not an expert on HEPA filters, but this filter looks and feels very sturdy and of higher quality.Overall, I believe this purifier is well worth the price, just judging from the apparent build quality, the aesthetics that rival Dyson or Apple, and the quality of the filter unit inside of the purifier. I'd recommend this product to anyone who needs to freshen up an area in their home, or to produce "clean smelling" air in a space. Just from my short time with it, and feeling the output from the fan on top, I can only imagine that it does very well with filtering dust and allergens as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I decided to get an air purifier due to my neighbor is smoking weed and I live in an apartment and we have all sorts of smells out here. This air purifier is just the right size for my bedroom. The air purifier is solid and I had it for almost a year I kept the filter clean whenever dust builds up so I haven't replaced the filter at all. This has an air quality sensor and has auto features that automatically adjust the fan speed depending on the air quality however the sensor is not sensitive enough to pick up bad air quality even if I farted in front of the filter it doesn't pick up a bad air :) and that's the only complaint I have but overall it is a good air purifier and it serves its purpose. I can feel the difference with and without using it. I can breathe and sleep better at night and using the auto mode it is quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little air purifier
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this for my son’s room. He’s 18 and he is oblivious of the smell in his room, so I got this. This is a perfect size for a bedroom and it’s not too big. It’s cute and quiet, as well as easy to use. So far the smell is almost entirely gone from the room and it’s been used one full night. Very happy with this air purifier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Item Works
reviews.reviewText: To eliminate the aroma of neighbors smoking habits, this item worked well in a small room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Going strong since 2020 - it's now 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've had two of these for three years now. One still works perfectly like it did when I first got it - changes air quality light colors and fan speeds quickly when I cook to clear the air. I keep that one on auto and keep it in my living room, where my air quality actually changes the most, so it can work its magic.The second one has a broken air quality sensor - it broke about a year ago. If I turn on the air quality light, it's red all of the time. If I put it on auto, it runs full speed constantly. It still works just fine otherwise. I replace the filters on both of them regularly and even the "broken" one has a dirty filter when I go to change it, so it still does its job. I think of the one with the broken sensor as my Chicken Little air purifier - it very much thinks the sky is falling so I just set it to 1 all the time and keep it in my bedroom where it doesn't really need to work very hard.Would 100% recommend these and if either of them ever completely kicks the bucket, I will absolutely buy another of this exact model.
